alert.note: Alert for Benton; Mille Lacs; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:58PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mille Lacs, northeastern Benton and southeastern Morrison Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Foley, or 22 miles southeast of Little Falls, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milaca and Foreston. This includes U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 191 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities.
